TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodePropertySetValueReferenceExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Docs.summary: Represents the value argument of a property set method call within a property set method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodePropertySetValueReferenceExpression represents the value argument of a property set method call within a property set method declaration.
A property set method typically assigns or uses the value assigned to the property. Within the property set method, this value is represented by an implicit variable represented in CodeDOM by a CodePropertySetValueReferenceExpression.
## Examples This example demonstrates use of a CodePropertySetValueReferenceExpression to represent the value argument passed to a property set value statement block.
[!code-cpp[CodePropertySetValueExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.codepro_0_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[CodePropertySetValueExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.codepro_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[CodePropertySetValueExample#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.codepro_0_1.vb)]
